subject: IRREVOCABLE SWIFT PAYMENT VIA ATM MASTER CARD
body:
Attn 
 
I acknowledge the receipt of your response. 
 
This is to let you know that we have started the processing of your ATM CARD in your name. Understand the reason why the United Nations are giving you this fund is because your email address is among the people that was scammed before and the United Nations want to use this fund to compensate you. 
 
The sum of US$5.000,000.00 compensatory settlement will be credited into the ATM Master Card and enable you to withdraw your funds through ATM Machine in your country with a maximum withdrawal of US$2.000.00 per day. Your limit can be increased to any amount upon your request. 
 
In this regards, you are to furnish us with the requested information below for issuance and delivery of your ATM Master Card at your doorstep address without any further delay; 
 
1. Mobile Telephone: 
2. Delivery Address: 
3. Full Name: 
 
Understand that you will pay $420 for insurance and shipment fee, be assured that you will receive your atm card without any delay once you follow our instructions. 
 
Get back to me as soon as you receive this email. 
 
Yours faithfully, 
Mr Kennedy Uzorka 
Managing Director/Chief Executive 
Officer of United Bank For Africa 
Telephone +2348121784957

subject: Re: IRREVOCABLE SWIFT PAYMENT VIA ATM MASTER CARD
body:
Hello Mr. Kennedy Uzorka,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the processing of my ATM card. I appreciate the United Nations' efforts to compensate those who have been scammed before.

Before proceeding, I would like to ask a few questions to ensure that everything is clear. Firstly, could you please provide more information about the insurance and shipment fee? How much would it cost and how can I make the payment?

Additionally, I would like to know how long it will take for the ATM card to be delivered to my doorstep address once all the necessary information has been provided.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Jesse

subject: Re: IRREVOCABLE SWIFT PAYMENT VIA ATM MASTER CARD
body:
Hello Mr. Kennedy Uzorka,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the processing of my ATM card. I appreciate the information you have provided so far. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Can you please explain in more detail how the United Nations identified my email address as one of the people who were scammed before? I would like to understand the process they used to select me for this compensation.

2. Could you clarify what is meant by "US settlement"? Is this the total amount that will be credited to my ATM card?

3. Regarding the insurance and shipment fee, could you provide me with more information about the cost and payment method? I want to make sure I understand all the expenses involved.

4. How long does it usually take for the ATM card to be delivered once all the necessary information is provided?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how to proceed with this compensation process.

Best wishes,
Jesse

subject: Re: IRREVOCABLE SWIFT PAYMENT VIA ATM MASTER CARD
body:
Hello Mr. Kennedy Uzorka,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the processing of my ATM card. I appreciate the information you have provided so far. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Can you please explain in more detail how my email address being scammed before makes me eligible for compensation from the United Nations?

2. What is the total amount that will be credited to the ATM Master Card? Is there a specific limit on daily withdrawals?

3. Could you clarify the insurance and shipment fee? How much would it cost and how can I make the payment?

4. Can you provide more information about the delivery process? How long does it usually take for the ATM card to arrive at my doorstep address?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Jesse

subject: Re: IRREVOCABLE SWIFT PAYMENT VIA ATM MASTER CARD
body:
Hello Mr. Kennedy Uzorka,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the processing of my ATM card. I appreciate the information you have provided so far. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Can you please explain in more detail how the United Nations identified my email address as one of the people who were scammed before? I would like to understand the process they used to select me for this compensation.

2. Could you clarify what is meant by "US settlement"? Is this a specific amount that will be credited to my ATM card, or can it vary?

3. Regarding the insurance and shipment fee, could you provide more information about the cost and payment method? I want to make sure I understand all the expenses involved.

4. How long does it usually take for the ATM card to be delivered once all the necessary information is provided and fees are paid?

subject: Re: IRREVOCABLE SWIFT PAYMENT VIA ATM MASTER CARD
body:
Hello Mr. Kennedy Uzorka,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding this opportunity. I appreciate the information you have provided so far. I understand that the United Nations wants to compensate me for being scammed in the past, and I am interested in learning more about how this process works.

Before I proceed, could you please clarify a few things for me? Firstly, what is the total amount of compensation that I would be eligible to receive? Additionally, could you explain more about the insurance and shipment costs that you mentioned? How much would those expenses be?

Once I have a better understanding of these details, I will be able to provide you with my mobile telephone number, delivery address, and full name as requested.

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Jesse

subject: Re: IRREVOCABLE SWIFT PAYMENT VIA ATM MASTER CARD
body:
Hello Mr. Kennedy Uzorka,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing this information. I appreciate your efforts in compensating those who have been scammed before. It's good to know that the United Nations is taking such measures.

I'm interested in learning more about this opportunity. Could you please provide some additional details? Specifically, I would like to know how the insurance and shipment fees are calculated, and if there are any other costs involved in receiving the ATM Master Card.

Also, could you clarify how long it will take for the card to be ready once the insurance and shipment fees are paid? And what is the process for requesting an increase in withdrawal limit?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Jesse
